name: Beluga.fi
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Beluga.fi is both an AMM and a yield farming protocol aiming to give users exposure to profitable farming opportunities on the Binance Smart Chain ecosystem.
